articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Leading Members and Principal Artistes of Chinese Art Troupe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Leading Members and Principal Artistes of Chinese Art Troupe
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with leading members and principal artistes of the art troupe of the Political Department of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army headed by its Deputy Director Song Kun at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Saturday.
					 Present there were senior officials of the party, the army and the state, the chairman of a friendly party and the Chinese ambassador to the DPRK here.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Art Troupe
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Art Troupe
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the art troupe of the Political Department of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Song Kun, deputy director of the department who is head of the troupe, on Saturday.

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe Feted by DPRK Government
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe Feted by DPRK Government
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The government of the DPRK arranged a reception at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday in honor of the visiting art troupe of the Political Department of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the art troupe headed by Deputy Director Song Kun, Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Il Chol, Choe Thae Bok, Ro Tu Chol, Kang Nung Su, Choe Chang Sik, Jong Thae Gun, Kim Yong Il and officials concerned, creators and artistes. 
					
					 Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, said in his speech made at the reception that the performance of the Chinese modern dance drama "A song in praise of Hongmei" in Pyongyang is a clear expression of the close friendly relations between the artistes and other people of the two countries.
					
					 Kang referred to the fact that the DPRK-China friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung together with revolutionaries of the elder generation of China has grown stronger day by day under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 He emphasized that the DPRK would make positive efforts together with the comrades of China to boost the bilateral exchange and cooperation in the field of culture and arts in the future, too. 
					
					 Song Kun in his speech said that this year marked the 60th anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK. He referred to the great achievements made by the Korean people in various fields by displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, firmly rallied around the Workers' Party of Korea for the past 60 years.
					
					 He was firmly convinced that the diligent and brave Korean people would make greater successes in building a great prosperous powerful nation under the leadership of the WPK headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Saying that the traditional China-DPRK friendship provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries is a common precious treasure deeply rooted in the minds of the peoples of the two countries, he added that they would make positive efforts to strengthen the China-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe Gives Performance for Guests of Honor
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe Gives Performance for Guests of Honor
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The visiting art troupe of the Political Department of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army gave a performance of the Chinese modern dance drama "A song in praise of Hongmei" for guests of honor at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Saturday.
					 Invited to see the performance were senior officials of the party, the army and the state, the chairman of a friendly party and officials concerned, creators and artistes and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here. 
					
					 Among the audience were the Chinese ambassador to the DPRK and members of his embassy here.
					
					 The drama based on the real fact during the civil revolutionary war of China shows about  the heroic struggle of the people true to their revolutionary principle despite the cruel torture, threats and blackmail by the enemies in prison with firm conviction in the victory of the revolution under the leadership of Chairman Mao Zedong and the Communist Party.
					
					 The performers well depicted the revolutionary content of the work with true artistic rhythm.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience for its high ideological value and artistry.
					
					 A floral basket was conveyed to the performers and senior officials of the party, the army and the state mounted the stage to congratulate the performers on their successful performance.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Friendship Tower
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Friendship Tower on Saturday on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the Chinese People's Volunteers' entry into the Korean front. 
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Choe Yong Rim, secretary general of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, Kim Jong Sik, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials concerned and working people in the city.  
					
					 Placed before the tower amidst the playing of wreath-laying music were a wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet, wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of People's Security, the Ministry of Foreign Trade and the Ministry of Culture, a wreath in the joint name of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association and a wreath in the joint name of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK and the Pyongyang City People's Committee. Then the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers who bravely fought after entering into the Korean front. 
					
					 A wreath in the joint name of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK and the Pyongyang City People's Committee, a wreath in the joint name of the Hyongjesan District Committee of Pyongyang City of the WPK and the Hyongjesan District People's Committee and a wreath in the name of a unit of the Korean People's Army were placed before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the CPV in Hyongjesan District on the same day.
					
					 Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming and staff members of his embassy and the Central Committee of the Association of Chinese Residents in Korea laid wreaths before the Friendship Tower and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the CPV in Hyongjesan District of Pyongyang that day. 
					
					 Floral tribute was paid by the art troupe of the Political Department of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army headed by its Deputy Director Song Kun to the Friendship Tower on the same day.

articles.title: Anniversary of CPV's Entry into Korean Front Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of CPV's Entry into Korean Front Observed
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers today dedicate signed articles to the 58th anniversary of the Chinese People's Volunteers' entry into the Korean front. 
					 The party and government of China sent the Chinese People's Volunteers made up of excellent sons and daughters of the Chinese people to the Korean front under the banner of " Resisting America and Aiding Korea, Safeguarding the Home and Defending the Motherland" in the very difficult and grave period for the Korean people, says Rodong Sinmun in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					After rushing to the Korean front, the fighters of the CPV waged a heroic war of resistance against the aggressors, the common enemy of the two countries, standing in the same trench with the Korean People's Army.  
					
					 They bravely dashed to the enemy positions braving sacrifices under a hail of its bullets and shells, mowing down aggressors and defending heights and villages of Korea at the cost of their blood. 
					
					 The popular heroism and feats performed by them made a great contribution to the strengthening and development of the DPRK-China friendship.    
					
					 The DPRK and China are close neighbors and the bilateral friendship has deep historic roots and a fine tradition.  
					
					The peoples of the two countries created long ago a tradition of sharing feelings and helping each other in the common struggle against the robber-like Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 The Chinese people are now making positive efforts to build a harmonious socialist society based on the scientific view on development under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Hu Jintao as its general secretary. 
					
					The traditional DPRK-China friendship is favorably developing as the days go by under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries. 
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the Party and government of the DPRK to develop the bilateral friendship from generation to generation. The DPRK-China relations of friendship and cooperation will grow stronger thanks to the two peoples' common efforts in the future. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the immortal feats performed by the fallen fighters of the CPV will always remain shining.

articles.title: DPRK Government Decides to Send Aid Materials to Cuban Government
articles.content:
DPRK Government Decides to Send Aid Materials to Cuban Government
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- As reported, hurricane hit Cuba in August and September, causing casualties and big material losses. 
					 The DPRK government decided to send aid materials to the Cuban government in order to help the Cuban people eradicate the aftermath of the damage and bring their living to normal as soon as possible.

articles.title: Greetings to Austrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Austrian President
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Heinz Fischer, Federal President of the Republic of Austria, on Oct. 14 on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished him greater success in his work for the well-being of the Austrian people.

articles.title: Greetings to Kazak President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kazak President
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished him great success in his noble work for the prosperity of the country and the wellbeing of the people, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in conformity with the mutual interests.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and Grenadines
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and Grenadines
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, on Oct. 22 sent a message of greetings to Ralf Gonsalves, Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and Grenadines, on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of its independence. 
					The message sincerely wished the friendly people of Saint Vincent and Grenadines progress and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Goodwill Delegation Leaves for Southeast Asia
articles.content:
DPRK Goodwill Delegation Leaves for Southeast Asia
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A goodwill delegation of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries headed by its Acting Chairman Mun Jae Chol left here Saturday to  visit Cambodia, Laos and Vietnam. A delegation of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea headed by Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Han Kyong Song left here on the same day to visit China. 
					 Meanwhile, a delegation of the foreign ministry of the Republic of Bulgaria headed by Deputy Minister Radion Popov arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: DPRK's View on Information and Communication Expressed
articles.content:
DPRK's View on Information and Communication Expressed
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Today information activities are playing an important role in promoting peace, security and social unity and sustainable development of the world and the rapid development of information and communication technology, in particular, is exerting great influence on all fabrics of human life, said a DPRK delegate, clarifying the view of the delegation of the DPRK in a speech made at the meeting of the Fourth Committee of the 63rd UN General Assembly on Oct. 21.  
					 He accused some specified countries of spreading their "view on value" and lifestyle among other countries after monopolizing information and communication media and floating misinformation to create social confusion.
					
					 He went on to say: The U.S. "Radio Free Asia" targeting against the DPRK and many other Asian countries, for example, is a wanton violation of the UN Charter and the principle of international law. If such phenomena are allowed to go on, the world will plunge into disorder and confusion.
					
					He stressed the need to regard it as a primary task to establish a new and fair order in the international information activities and pay special attention to increasing the capacity of information and communication in developing countries.
					
					 He expressed the expectation that the Information Department of the UN Secretariat would make greater efforts for boosting the information capacity and training technical personnel in developing countries.

articles.title: Many Art Works Portraying Three Generals of Mt. Paektu Created
articles.content:
Many Art Works Portraying Three Generals of Mt. Paektu Created
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Studio, the Art Studio of the Korean People's Army and other studios have produced many works portraying the three generals of Mt. Paektu worth national treasures this year, too.
					 Among them are Korean painting "Watching a Soldier in the First Shooting Drill" and oil painting "Festival Held amidst Gunfire" which impressively depict President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and poster "Our Comrade Supreme Commander Is Real Father of Soldiers" which reflects the personality of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il as a great man who trained the People's Army as an invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Korean painting "Putting Forward the People as Masters of State", pencil drawing "Saying that Land Belongs to Tillers", Korean paintings "Finding Himself among Workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex" and "Always Finding Himself among People in Taehongdan" and other works convey the personality of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as great men down to posterity.
					
					 Poster "We Will Hold the Great Sun in High Esteem and Follow It  for All Ages!" and other works deal with the fixed faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to achieve the prosperity of the country under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem forever.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppets' Reckless Anti-DPRK War Moves Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppets' Reckless Anti-DPRK War Moves Assailed 
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppets in a 17-point joint statement adopted at the recent 40th south Korea-U.S. "annual security consultative meeting" and at a press conference held at its end officially clarified the issue of bolstering "the defense posture of combined forces", the U.S provision of its "nuclear umbrella," the rapid deployment of the U.S. reinforcements in case of "emergency" on the Korean Peninsula, the issue of raising the capacity of the puppet forces for fighting a war and transferring the war reserve materiel of the U.S. forces stockpiled in south Korea, etc. while calling for "getting ready for emergency situation" to be triggered off by someone.
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland in a statement on Oct. 24 dismissed the U.S. and the south Korean puppets' open war confab for stifling the DPRK by force of arms as an intolerable provocation against the DPRK and a declaration of an all-out confrontation with it.
					
					 Urging the U.S. and the south Korean warlike forces to ponder over the serious consequences to be entailed by their provocative moves for a nuclear war of aggression against the north and behave with discretion, the statement continued: 
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that Ri Sang Hui, puppet minister of National Defense, went so impudent as to openly let loose again the reckless remarks pulling up the DPRK.
					
					 It is hard to expect the development of the north-south relations or peaceful reunification as long as such diehard confrontational element and war maniac as Ri Sang Hui is allowed to go scot-free.
					
					 Such guy as Ri who is keen to do harm to fellow countrymen with a rifle given by the U.S. will not be able to escape the fate of a tiger moth.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group had better clearly understand that the DPRK's warning that it will certainly settle accounts with those seeking a foolish ambition is by no means an empty talk.

articles.title: South Korean Puppet Army's Dangerous Moves for Preemptive Strike under Fire
articles.content:
South Korean Puppet Army's Dangerous Moves for Preemptive Strike under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet army's moves for a preemptive strike at the DPRK have reached an extremely dangerous phase. 
					On Oct. 14, the chief of the general staff of the puppet air force at the "inspection of administration" of the "National Defence Committee of the National Assembly" cried out for building a network-centered battle system, blustering that "he would lead the air force with main emphasis on giving full play to the substantial combined fighting capacity."
					
					 This system is a new method of carrying out battles as it is aimed at making precision strikes at the enemy by integrating the monitoring, reconnaissance, commanding and controlling and precision strike system through a network. 
					
					Briefing on the above-said system, the side of the puppet air force openly claimed that "the building of the said system would provide capacity to make a preemptive strike at the enemy and thus hit its core target in advance"
					
					 The reckless remarks made by him are nothing but a declaration of a war as he openly betrayed the puppet army's posture for a preemptive strike by completely throwing away the word "defence" which has been much touted so far. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet army is now putting spurs to the preparations for a preemptive strike from the air, ground and sea by putting into a concrete shape the shift from the old conception of "counter fire battle" to "offensive fire battle." 
					
					 All facts clearly indicate that the moves for a war stepped up by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in pursuance of the U.S. imperialists' policy of aggression against the DPRK are inching close to an extremely dangerous phase.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Racket of Military Confrontation under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Racket of Military Confrontation under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The desire of the Korean nation for reunification is now being chilled and the inter-Korean relations are being pushed to a phase of confrontation and war. This is chiefly attributable to the south Korean war maniacs' reckless racket of military confrontation. Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a by-lined article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 These moves for military confrontation are an inevitable product of the treacherous and anti-reunification confrontational policy of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 No sooner had Lee come to power than he blustered that it is the "main goal of the policy of national defence" to "make the north take a changed action" in the inter-Korean ties by use of "force." 
					
					His demeanor means an open declaration of head-on confrontation with fellow countrymen in opposition to reconciliation and cooperation with them. The Lee regime's "policy towards the north" is a policy of confrontation and war based on "military edge," in the final analysis.
					
					The puppet military is putting spurs to bolstering up its armed forces and, at the same time, busy carrying out restructuring to boost the operation capability of the army, navy and air force.
					
					 The above-mentioned racket of military confrontation is a deliberate provocative action to check the advance of the June 15 era of reunification and drive the inter-Korean relations to collapse.
					
					 The Lee group is getting frantic in its war moves, regarding the DPRK as the "principal enemy," a partner for reconciliation and unity, and contemplating even a "preemptive strike." These reckless moves resulted in totally suspending the dialogues and cooperation between the north and the south which had been underway after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, drove the military confrontation to the worst phase and rendered the situation so tense that a war may break out on the Korean Peninsula any moment.
					
					 Lee group's treacherous moves for military confrontation can never be tolerated as they stand in the way of the June 15 era of reunification, challenging the will and desire of the nation.
					
					The Lee group is bound to meet a doom for getting frantic with the moves for military confrontation to do harm to the fellow countrymen, opposed to the nation and reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Halt Moves for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Halt Moves for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is driving the relations between the north and the south to collapse, going against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification, and persisting in military provocations against the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday denounces this in a signed commentary.
					
					The commentary cites facts to prove that due to the reckless military confrontational racket kicked up by the Lee group in zealous pursuance of the U.S. scenario to invade the DPRK, the inter-Korean relations have reached a touch-and-go situation in the true sense of the words, in which a trifling case or accidental conflict may develop into a war in a moment.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations which had favorably developed since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration faced a catastrophic crisis all of a sudden and there prevails on the Korean Peninsula an extremely dangerous situation in which a war may break out any moment. Needless to say, this is a direct product of the Lee group's anachronistic and traitorous conception of confrontation and wild ambition for aggression as it is going reckless to invade the north by force of arms, regarding its compatriots as the "principal enemy" while negating the historic north-south joint declarations.
					
					The history of the Korean nation's division which has lasted for more than half a century goes to prove that a conflict and a war may break out unless hostility, confrontational stand and attempt at aggression against fellow countrymen are dropped.
					
					 In reality the group of traitors is busy staging war exercises to invade the north with foreign forces in a bid to realize its pipe dream, vociferating about anyone's "emergency." This is not a mere confrontational racket but an open declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the Lee group to dare to stand in military confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 If someone commits provocations against the DPRK, it will not miss an opportunity but resolutely respond to confrontation with confrontation and war with war and mercilessly punish the aggressors and achieve national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, without fail. In this life-and-death war the DPRK will gain reunification, not losing anything except the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 The DPRK will never allow the Lee group's reckless inter-Korean confrontational racket to spark off a war of aggression against it.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Crafty and Clumsy Demeanor under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Crafty and Clumsy Demeanor under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Japan extended sanctions against the DPRK for another six months while persistently raising the abduction issue which has nothing to do with the mission and purport of the six-party talks. Assailing Japan for its despicable demeanor a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					 It is preposterous for Japan to claim that no progress is made due to the stance of the DPRK while vociferating about the settlement of the abduction issue whenever an opportunity presents itself. This is a mean and wicked act little short of turning white to black.
					
					 If Japan is to raise the abduction issue it should frankly admit, repent of and settle the abduction of Koreans and the forcible drafting of them by the Japanese imperialists in the past as well as the abduction of citizens of the DPRK in recent years.
					
					 Japan is kicking up a racket calling for "pressure" and "sanctions" against someone, citing the abduction issue as a pretext. This is disgusting, indeed. 
					
					 Lurking behind the action taken by the Japanese reactionaries to extend the sanctions is a sinister intention. By persistently making fuss about the abduction issue Japan seeks to divert elsewhere the concern and vigilance of the international community triggered off by its moves to become a military giant and launch reinvasion. Such clumsy calculation reminding one of the country peddler is not all Japan seeks through the extended sanctions against the DPRK. It also seeks the purpose of evading the redemption of its past and justifying its human rights abuses against Koreans in Japan.
					
					 There are not a few countries in the world that committed crimes against humankind in the past but it is only Japan that adds crimes to those already committed by it and persistently resorts to sleight of hand to go without settling its past while shelving the issue of its redemption although the old century is replaced by the new one. Japan seeks to hush up the fulfillment of its commitment to redress its past through such clumsy trick.
					
					 Whenever it raises the abduction issue Japan talks about "people's sentiment." But the Korean people's bitterness toward Japan is incomparably stronger than that of Japanese toward Koreans. Japan should properly understand the anti-Japanese sentiment of Koreans and their will to certainly force Japan to redeem its past.
					
					 The Japanese authorities would be well advised to drop their way of thinking and attitude as imposters, drawing a lesson from the miserable end of their predecessors who were politically ruined after being censured and condemned by the public at home and abroad for working hard to do harm to the DPRK through sanctions and pressure.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Promoting Global Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Promoting Global Independence
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will make positive efforts to boost the friendship and solidarity with all the progressive people of the world advocating independence, foil the war policy of the imperialist aggressor forces and their moves for domination and bring earlier global independence, holding aloft the banner of independence against imperialism under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to struggle for global independence.
					
					 The DPRK shaped an independent line and policies as required by the aspiration and wishes of the Korean people and the specific conditions in every period of the revolution and at its every stage and has adhered to the independent and revolutionary principle of implementing them by enlisting the efforts of the popular masses, thereby covering the path of shining victory, not wavering even a bit in any storm and stress. 
					
					 The DPRK has developed its relations with other countries on the principle of complete equality, mutual respect and non-interference in internal affairs and always solved all the problems independently in the interests of the Korean revolution according to its own judgment and decision in its external relations.
					
					 The Korean people have accelerated the victorious advance of the socialist cause, frustrating the imperialists' moves for aggression and war from a steadfast anti-imperialist independent stand, thus infusing confidence and inspiration into the progressives of the world and making a contribution to accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					he Korean people's resolute struggle to protect sovereignty and their struggle against imperialism have helped avert a war and preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula and they have contributed to ensuring global peace and security.
					
					 The Korean people have positively supported and encouraged the progressives of the world in their struggle to protect sovereignty from domination and subjugation. 
					
					 The DPRK has made positive efforts to increase the say and influence of the progressive countries and protect their interests in the international arena.

articles.title: Legal Action against Criminals Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Legal Action against Criminals Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Federation of Peasants Associations and the Federation of Women Peasants Associations called a joint press conference in Seoul on October 21 at which they demanded a legal action against high-ranking officials of the puppet government tainted with corruption and irregularities.
					 At the press conference speakers charged that at the "inspection of administration" the "Board of Audit" should clarify the reason why it did not open to the public the results of the inspection of those who received subsidies to rice cultivators although it conducted the probe. 
					
					 They held that the above-said board should not only punish those responsible for the expropriation of subsidies to rice cultivators but look into "their violation of the law on farmland and suspected tax evasion", too, and thus mete out a deserved judgement to them by "law." 
					
					 Then, a press release was read out at the press conference. It urged the present "government" to conduct the above-said inspection in full line with the demand of the people.

articles.title: Stop to Moves to Railroad "Motion Calling for Ratification of FTA" through NA Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Moves to Railroad "Motion Calling for Ratification of FTA" through NA Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the south Korea-U.S. FTA of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on October 22 at which it demanded a stop to the moves to railroad through the "National Assembly" the "motion calling for the ratification of the FTA".
					At the press conference speakers warned that the south Korean economy will face the second international financial crisis in case the FTA beset with not a few problems passes through the NA as it is.
					
					 Noting that the conclusion of the FTA is little short of a double murder of the people and an anachronistic attitude, to all intents and purposes, they demanded the 18th NA stop the moves to pass the above-said "motion" as it will further deepen the economic crisis in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Vows to Take Lead in Anti-Lee Myung Bak Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Vows to Take Lead in Anti-Lee Myung Bak Struggle
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Measure Committee for Frustrating the Crackdown upon Participants in Candlelight Actions, Moves for Scrapping the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration and the Plot to Fake up a Case for Suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea on Oct. 21 issued a special statement titled "We will take the lead in frustrating the plot to fake up a case for suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and preserving and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration."
					The statement recalled that the solidarity has staged dynamic actions for the country's reunification and the democracy of the society, enjoying full support of the patriotic personages and people since its formation.
					
					 It accused the present regime of getting frantic in the search and confiscation operation and arrest campaign in a bid to label it "an enemy-benefiting organization".
					
					 Noting that the Lee Myung Bak group is intensifying the crackdown upon the forces of the reunification movement under the pretext of "security", the statement said such repressive moves are little short of an undisguised declaration of a war to scrap the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and the acts to hamstring the efforts of all Koreans for the peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					If the Lee regime is allowed to continue its rash actions, the era of independent reunification will face a serious crisis and there will be no way of preventing the inter-Korean relations from being brought  back to the period of the Cold War, warned the statement.
					
					 It declared that the solidarity would stand up against the Lee Myung Bak regime and launch an all-people's struggle to "force Lee to step down".

articles.title: Release of Member of Solidarity for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Urged
articles.content:
Release of Member of Solidarity for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Urged
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the Actions of the 16th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) on Oct. 22 issued a statement titled "Former chairman of the national reunification committee of Hanchongryon should be released as soon as possible".
					 The statement referred to the fact that the security authorities arrested and detained Kim Song Il, former chairman of the above-said committee of Hanchongryon who was active in the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, on charges of violating the "National Security Law".
					
					 He had conducted sincere activities for ensuring the right to existence of the people and the country's reunification, it stressed.
					
					 Hanchongryon will certainly force the Lee "government" to pay a dear price for its crime, the statement noted, urging the regime to immediately release the detained member of the solidarity. 
					
					 The statement called for certainly collapsing the present regime and building a new society as desired by the pro-reunification personages.

articles.title: Signature Campaign against Moves to Rewrite History Textbooks Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Signature Campaign against Moves to Rewrite History Textbooks Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Educationists affiliated to the History Teachers Association of south Korea launched a signature campaign titled "Declaration of History Teachers" on October 16 in protest against the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to distort history textbooks, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 Through the signature campaign they asserted that the "government's" work to rewrite the textbooks "Modern History of south Korea" for high schools is shaking the textbook screening system to its very foundation".
					
					 Noting that they turned out in actions, unable to tolerate the "government's" action to rewrite textbooks, they stated that they would announce the "Declaration of History Teachers" signed by history teachers and scholars and others through media advertisement till the end of this month when the authorities are expected to confirm the "revision proposal."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in pamphlet by the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela on Oct. 9.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), serves as an immortal programme for party construction and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK in which it paved a new road of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way of developing it into an eternal party of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised
 Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Figures of different countries spoke highly of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits at the events held from Oct. 9 to 12 on the occasions of the 63rd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union."
					Anders Karlsson, chairman of the Communist Party of Sweden, at a celebration meeting said that Kim Jong Il has pursued the Songun politics, defending the sovereignty of the country and socialism and instilling great confidence and inspiration into all people of the world struggling for socialism and progress.
					
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, at a seminar noted that the WPK has become a most revolutionary and militant party in the world as President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il exerted enormous efforts for founding and strengthening the party. 
					
					Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark－DPRK Friendship Association,  at a meeting said that no force on earth can overpower the Korean people as long as there are the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il and the single-minded unity.
					
					 Richard Stenberg, chairman of the Swedish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, at a seminar said that the DPRK has demonstrated its might as a powerful socialist state which no formidable enemy dares provoke, a demonstration of the validity and vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, at a seminar explained and proved the fact that the WPK has achieved successes by implementing the Songun politics in all fields under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: WPK Praised
articles.content:
WPK Praised
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is a vanguard party for the world revolution.
					 The secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism said this in a statement released on the occasion of the 63rd founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He stressed that President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK guided by the Juche idea and brought about great changes by wisely leading it.
					
					 The WPK, party of Juche type, which built a socialist system centered on the popular masses on the land of Korea has always advanced along the road of victory despite the U.S. imperialists' moves for aggression and natural calamities, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					 General Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Il has further reinforced the Party organizationally and ideologically. He has developed the WPK into an invincible party through the struggle for defending sovereignty of the country.
					
					Today the WPK serves as a beacon of hope for the world revolutionary people struggling to build a new world where the popular masses have become genuine masters of their destiny.

articles.title: WPK's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
WPK's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries spoke highly of the exploits performed by the Workers' Party of Korea at the events held from Oct. 6 to 14 on the occasions of the 63rd founding anniversary of the WPK and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union."
					E. Maksim, executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, at a seminar said that the DPRK has registered great successes in various fields including politics, economy and culture under the Songun leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Mohammad Aslam Nagi, secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, at a seminar noted that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK into an invincible party and built the DPRK into a military power strong enough to defeat any imperialist aggressor forces and firmly protected the dignity of the country and the nation.
					
					 Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, at a seminar said that the Korean people have defended the sovereignty of the country and are successfully building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation while smashing the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' offensive against socialism under the leadership of the WPK.   The credit for all this goes to Kim Jong Il who is held in high esteem as the top leader of the Party. 
					
					The manager of the Syrian newspaper Al Usubuu Al Riadih said at a film show that the Korean people have firmly defended the socialist system, maintaining independence under the leadership of the WPK which holds Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its general secretary, adding that their struggle is a paragon for the world progressive people.

articles.title: RPDC decide enviar materiales de auxilio a Cuba
articles.content:
RPDC decide enviar materiales de auxilio a Cuba
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ATCC) -- Como ya trascendidos, Cuba sufrio perdidas humanas y muchos danos materiales debido a los dos tifones que azotaron esta nacion antillana en agosto y septiembre.
					 El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea decidio enviar los materiales de auxilio al gobierno de la Republica de Cuba para contribuir a que el pueblo cubano recupere su vida estable tras reparar cuanto antes las consecuencias de desastres naturales.

articles.title: CRPP condena las imprudentes maniobras contra RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP condena las imprudentes maniobras contra RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ATCC) -- Al cabo de la 40a "reunion consultiva anual para la seguridad" Esstados Unidos-Sur de Corea, efectuada recientemente, fue aprobada la declaracion conjunta de 17 clausulas y ofrecida una rueda de prensa.
					En esas ocasiones EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, al hablar de los "preparativos de alguien para hacer frente al cambio repentino de la situacion", aclararon oficialmente los problemas relativos al fortalecimiento de la "postura de defensa conjunta", el ofrecimiento del "paraguas nuclear" de EE.UU., el emplazamiento rapido de las fuerzas de refuerzo de las tropas norteamericanas en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana, el aumento de la capacidad belica del ejercito titere surcoreano, la entrega de la reserva de materiales belicos de las tropas norteamericanas depositados en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Esta abierta conspiracion belica de EE.UU. y los  titeres surcoreanos para aplastar militarmente la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC) deviene la imperdonable provocacion y la declaracion de enfrentamiento frontal a la RPDC.
					
					Asi senalo el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) en una declaracion del dia 24 y continuo:
					
					Los belicistas yanquis y surcoreanos deben reflexionar sobre las graves consecuencias que emanen de sus provocativas maniobras de guerra nuclear para la agresion a la RPDC y actuar con prudencia.
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que el ministro de Defensa titere del Sur de Corea Ri Sang Hui volvio a proferir las peroraciones acusando atrevidamente a la  RPDC.
					
					 Al dejar intacto a Ri, monstruoso elemento de enfrentamiento y maniaco de guerra, no se puede esperar jamas la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur ni la reunificacion pacifica.
					
					Los tipejos como Ri, que tratan de atentar con las armas ofrecidas por EE.UU. a los connacionales, no podran evitar el destino de la mariposa nocturna que entra volando  en medio de las llamas.
					
					 La banda de Lee debe darse clara cuenta de que no es la palabra vana nuestra advertencia de que liquidariamos hasta el fin a quienes persiguen la absurda ilusion.

articles.title: Campana de confrontacion de Lee Myung Bak traera la guerra
articles.content:
Campana de confrontacion de Lee Myung Bak traera la guerra
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ATCC) -- A traves de un comentario individual difundido este sabado, el periodico Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que por una parte lleva a la coyuntura catastrofica las relaciones Norte-Sur desafiando frontalmente a la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio y se entrega por la otra al alboroto de provocacion militar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 El comentario prosigue:
					
					Debido a la aventurera campana de confrontacion militar de la banda de Lee, que se adhiere activamente a las maniobras agresivas a la RPDC de EE.UU., las relaciones Norte-Sur, que se desarrollaban positivamente despues del 15 de junio de 2000, cayeron en la crisis que dara paso en un instante a la guerra por cualquier contingencia o choque accidental.
					
					Esto es un producto directo de la anacronica y antinacional concepcion de confrontacion y la ambicion de agresion de la banda de Lee que actua imprudentemente para atacar militarmente a sus connacionales tomandolos por su "enemigo principal" y negando las historicas declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
					
					La historia de division nacional de mas de medio siglo demuestra que si ellos no dejan la hostilidad, la posicion de confrontacion y la ambicion agresiva a sus connacionales, seran inevitables el choque y la consiguiente guerra.
					
					Practicamente, los desenfrenados ejercicios belicos contra la RPDC, que hablando de la "situacion emergente" de alguien, libran los pandilleros de Lee con las fuerzas extranjeras para realizar su estupida ilusion, no se tratan de una simple campana de confrontacion sino abierta declaracion de guerra contra aquella.
					
					 Es tan ridicula la osadia de los compinches de Lee de enfrentarse militarmente con la RPDC.
					
					Si alguien provoca a la RPDC, esta no perdera esa oportunidad sino respondera rotundamente a la confrontacion con la confrontacion y a la guerra con la guerra para castigar implacablemente a los agresores y lograra sin falta la reunificacion de la patria que anhela tanto la nacion. 
					
					 Lo que ganaremos en esta guerra de vida o muerte es la reunificacion y lo que perderemos es la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					La RPDC no perdonara jamas las temerarias maniobras de confrontacion fratricida de la banda de Lee que busca la guerra contra el Norte.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia actitud astuta de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia actitud astuta de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ATCC) -- Bajo el pretexto del problema del secuestro que no tiene nada que ver con la mision y objetivo de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, Japon prolongo en ano medio sus medidas de sancion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					En cada ocasion que le ofrece, Japon aboga por el problema del secuestro diciendo que el estancamiento de los problemas pendientes se debe a la RPDC, lo cual es un acto absurdo y sucio tendente a convertir lo negro en lo blanco.
					
					 Critica asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					Si Japon quiere cuestionar el problema del secuestro, antes que nada, tiene que reconocer y solucionar con sinceridad sus crimenes de secuestro y arresto forzoso a los coreanos, cometidos en el pasado por los imperialistas nipones, y otros actos de secuestro a los ciudadanos de la RPDC perpetrados en los ultimos anos. 
					
					Es muy repugnante el proceder de Japon que habla de "presion" y "sancion" sobre alguien bajo el pretexto del problema del secuestro. 
					
					En el trasero de tal maniobra esta ocultada la siniestra intencion de los reaccionarios japoneses. Ellos tratan de desviar, bajo el rotulo del problema del secuestro, la preocupacion y alerta de la sociedad internacional sobre la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar y sus maniobras de nueva agresion. Por otra parte, intentan evadir la liquidacion del pasado criminal y justificar sus violaciones de DDHH contra los coreanos residentes en su pais. 
					
					En el mundo no son pocos los paises que cometieron crimenes ante la humanidad. Pero, no hay tal pais como Japon que no liquida de siglo en siglo sus crimenes del pasado sobreponiendo otros nuevos sino se desespera por evadir la indemnizacion por el respecto. 
					
					Cada vez que recurre al problema del secuestro, Japon habla del "sentimiento de la poblacion", pero es mucho mas vehemente la hostilidad antijaponesa del pueblo coreano. 
					
					 Japon debe saber bien el sentimiento antijapones y la voluntad del pueblo coreano de demandar la liquidacion del pasado criminal del pais isleno.
					
					 Las autoridades japonesas deben sacar lecciones del destino tragico de sus antecesores, que al cabo de actuar perversamente por derrocar el regimen coreano con la sancion y presion se fracasaron en lo politico sin cumplir sus mandatos al chocar con las protestas y criticas del interior y exterior del pais, y abandonar su actitud y modo de pensar de fraudulentos.
